TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsTokenRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 通过 Windows 组成员资格获取 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色信息。

span.span: Gets role information for an ASP.NET application from Windows group membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个只读的角色成员资格提供程序，它基于 windows 安全组检索 windows 用户的角色信息。The class is a read-only role-membership provider that retrieves role information for a Windows user based on Windows security groups. 它最适用于使用 Windows 身份验证模式的 ASP.NET 应用程序，其中 IIS 身份验证设置禁用匿名身份验证。It is most useful with ASP.NET applications that use Windows authentication mode where the IIS authentication settings disable anonymous authentication. 可以将 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为根据用户在特定 Windows 组中的成员身份来允许或拒绝访问。You can configure ASP.NET applications to allow or deny access based on a user's membership in a particular Windows group. 不能使用 类来创建或删除角色，或修改基于 Windows 组成员身份的角色的成员身份。You cannot use the class to create or delete roles or modify the membership of a role that is based on Windows group membership. 此功能由 Windows 操作系统管理。This functionality is managed by the Windows operating system. 类仅支持 抽象类的和方法 。The class supports only the and methods of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用 Windows 身份验证和 类来检索 windows 用户的角色信息。It specifies that the application uses both Windows authentication and the class to retrieve role information for Windows users. 元素指定只有 BUILTIN\Administrators 组中的用户可以访问应用程序。The element specifies that only users in the BUILTIN\Administrators group are allowed access to the application. ``` ```

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理

span.span: Understanding ASP.NET Role Management

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由 ASP.NET 调用，以创建 在应用程序的配置中指定的类的实例。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 不应在代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于等其他角色提供程序 ， 类不会将角色信息与应用程序关联。Unlike other role providers such as the , the class does not associate role information with an application. 而是从本地计算机上的 Windows 组中获取角色信息。Instead, the role information is taken from the Windows groups on the local computer. 使用类的同一服务器上的多个应用程序 始终共享相同的角色信息。Multiple applications on the same server that use the class always share the same role information. 虽然 `applicationName` 可在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中配置，但不会 使用属性来检索角色信息。Although the `applicationName` can be configured in the Web.config file for the application, the property is not used to retrieve role information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `system.web` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分中的元素。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的 实例，并将 属性设置为 `MyApplication` 。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取用户所属的 Windows 组的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the Windows groups that a user is in.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含指定用户所属的所有 Windows 组的名称。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the Windows groups that the specified user is in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 类调用，以从 windows 操作系统中检索指定用户所在的 windows 组的列表。This method is called by the class to retrieve from the Windows operating system a list of the Windows groups that the specified user is in. 仅可为当前已登录用户调用该方法，由 LOGON_USER 服务器变量标识。The method can be called only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 如果参数中提供的值 `username` 不是当前登录的用户的名称， 则会引发。If the value supplied in the `username` parameter is not the name of the currently logged-on user, a is thrown. 有关 ASP.NET 和 Windows 身份验证的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))。For more information an ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法检索指定用户的角色列表，并将角色列表绑定到 控件。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds the list of roles to a control. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅 。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/CS/viewrolescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/VB/viewrolesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够检查用户是否处于枚举描述的常见 Windows 角色之一中 。The method enables you to check whether a user is in one of the common Windows roles described by the enumeration. 此方法对于本地化为多种语言的应用程序很有用。This method is useful for applications that are localized into multiple languages. 此方法的重载 不是基类的一部分 ，只能通过将 类的属性转换 为类型来访问 此重载。This overload of the method is not part of the base class and can only be accessed by casting the property of the class as the type. 只能 为当前已登录的用户调用该方法，由 LOGON_USER 服务器变量标识。You can call the method only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 如果参数中提供的值 `username` 不是当前登录的用户的名称， 则会引发。If the value supplied in the `username` parameter is not the name of the currently logged-on user, an is thrown. 只能为当前已登录的用户调用 LOGON_USER 服务器变量标识的方法。 method can only be called for the currently logged-on user identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 当前登录的用户必须是经过 Windows 身份验证的用户。The current logged on user must be a Windows authenticated user. 有关 ASP.NET 和 Windows 身份验证的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))。For more information on ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查当前登录的用户是否属于管理员角色，然后允许用户查看该应用程序的角色信息。The following code example programmatically checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles information for the application. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅 。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/CS/ViewRoles2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/VB/ViewRoles2vb.aspx#2)]
